00031 #include "Theme.h"
00032 
00033 // undefine the macros.
00034 #undef DEFINE_IMAGE
00035 #undef DEFINE_COLOUR
00036 #undef DEFINE_FONT
00037 #undef SET_THEME_FLAGS
00038 
00039 
00040 #define THEME_EXTERNS
00041 
00042 #ifdef THEME_INITS
00043 #define DEFINE_IMAGE( name, initialiser, textual_name ) \
00044    theTheme.RegisterImage( name, initialiser, textual_name );
00045 #define DEFINE_COLOUR( name, initialiser, textual_name )\
00046    theTheme.RegisterColour( name, initialiser, textual_name );
00047 #define DEFINE_FONT( name, initialiser, textual_name )  \
00048    theTheme.RegisterFont( name, initialiser, textual_name );
00049 #define SET_THEME_FLAGS( flags ) theTheme.SetFlags(  flags );
00050 #undef THEME_DECLARATIONS
00051 #undef THEME_EXTERNS
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 #ifdef THEME_DECLARATIONS
00055 #define DEFINE_IMAGE( name, initialiser, textual_name )  AUDACITY_DLL_API teBmps name=-1;
00056 #define DEFINE_COLOUR( name, initialiser, textual_name ) AUDACITY_DLL_API int name=-1;
00057 #define DEFINE_FONT( name, initialiser, textual_name )  AUDACITY_DLL_API int name=-1;
00058 #define SET_THEME_FLAGS( flags )
00059 #undef THEME_INITS
00060 #undef THEME_EXTERNS
00061 #endif
00062 
00063 #ifdef THEME_EXTERNS
00064 #define DEFINE_IMAGE( name, initialiser, textual_name )  extern AUDACITY_DLL_API teBmps name;
00065 #define DEFINE_COLOUR( name, initialiser, textual_name ) extern AUDACITY_DLL_API int name;
00066 #define DEFINE_FONT( name, initialiser, textual_name ) extern AUDACITY_DLL_API int name;
00067 #define SET_THEME_FLAGS( flags )
00068 #endif
